title: Wanpaku Oomukashi Kum Kum (Kum Kum)
synopsis: This is the tale of Kum Kum, a kind of prehistoric "Dennis the Menace" who lived long ago. He and his family and friends belonged to a tribe of Mountain People who lived and hunted and farmed high in the hills near the Fire Mountain.
voices: ['Tagami, Kazue', 'Nakao, Ryusei', 'Ichiryuusai, Harumi', 'Akiyama, Runa', 'Oota, Yoshiko', 'Tomita, Kousei']
staff: [['Rintaro', ['Director']], ['Horie, Mitsuko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Columbia Yurikago Kai', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Yasuhiko, Yoshikazu', ['Character Design', ' Original Creator']]]
